mapper.select: select room_num from student_info where building_num = #{buildingNum} and num = #{studentNum}
select access_status from access_info where building_num = #{buildingNum} and student_num = #{studentNum} order by access_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into access_info(building_num, student_num, access_status) values(#{buildingNum}, #{studentNum}, #{accessStatus})
mapper.select: select case access_status when 1 then 'in' else 'out' end type, count(*) num from access_info where building_num = #{buildingNum} and access_time >= #{dawnTime} group by access_status

select s.name student_name, s.num, s.teacher_tel, b.building_num, b.access_time from block_info b inner join student_info s on b.student_num = s.num where b.building_num = #{buildingNum} and b.access_time >= #{dawnTime} order by access_time desc
